name: GAAD
description: I am currently helping GAAD migrate their website from Wordpress to Next.js

name: Brew Buddy
description: Brew Buddy enables users to search for breweries in any location, presenting them on a map alongside relevant information. Users can easily favorite breweries, and their selections are stored locally for future reference.

name: JSJ Storefront
description: JSJ is a fake store front where users can search for and purchase (not really) clothing and jewelry. It was a collaboration with 2 other fron end engineers where we wanted to push ourwselves to work with new-to-us technologies

name: Libation Station
description: Libation Station enables users to search for and save their favorite cocktail recipes using local storage.
